heading: Security grilles on buildings in occupancy groups B or M
text:
Security grilles abutting sidewalks on buildings in
  occupancy groups B or M shall comply with the retroactive requirements of item 4 of section 1008.1.4.5 of the New York city
  building code. On and after July 1, 2026, such grilles when closed shall permit visibility from the sidewalk of at least 70 percent of
  the area covered by such grille.
